result.markdown: --- title: "Week 5: Exponential smoothing" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Simple exponential smoothing * Corresponding ETS models ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 8.1-8.4 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-6, 8-9, 11-12 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html). ## Slides for seminar Download pdf # Seminar activities ## Assignments * [Assignment 3](assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Friday 12 April.
